titleStmt.title: An ansvver to Sir Thomas Manwaring's book, intituled, - An admonition to the reader of Sir Peter Leicester's books. Written by the same Sir Peter Leicester
titleStmt.author: Leycester, Peter, Sir, 1614-1678.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Mainwaring, Sir Thomas. An admonition to the reader of Sir Peter Leicester's books.
Caption title on p. 1 reads: An answer to Sir Thomas Manwarings books, &c.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
